dc:title: Day by Day - April 1936
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Admires Communist demonstrators, tells of speaking trips, and appreciates the youth in Kansas for their enthusiasm in learning of social issues.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 299 1936-04-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
